title: CROWDER: How the systemic silencing of speech affects YOU whether you like it or not

title: EXCLUSIVE Interview with Alex Jones! This Means War! (show notes)
description: A jury awarded Sandy Hook families ONE BILLION DOLLARS for words Alex Jones said. This doesn't only affect Jones; it affects EVERYONE, whether you like it or not. We explain why, and we have an EXCLUSIVE interview with Alex Jones — his first since the court ruling.

title: JP Morgan Chase cancels Ye from using their bank with no reason given (but you can guess)
description:
JP Morgan Chase decided they no longer want to be in the Yeezy business. They contacted Ye to tell him he has to take his personal banking elsewhere. His PERSONAL BANKING. Keep that in the back of your mind.

Candace Owens broke the news on Wednesday.
